title: Germany through the centuries and Hitler’s cocaine habit
itunes:title: Germany through the centuries and Hitler’s cocaine habit
itunes:subtitle: British Museum director Neil MacGregor joins us to talk about his new BBC Radio 4 series Germany: Memories of a Nation, which illustrates the country's history through a wealth of fascinating objects. Meanwhile, historical author Giles Milton...
description:
British Museum director Neil MacGregor joins us to talk about his new BBC Radio 4 series Germany: Memories of a Nation, which illustrates the country's history through a wealth of fascinating objects. Meanwhile, historical author Giles Milton discusses some surprising tales from the past, including the story of Adolf Hitler's drug addictions.

To read an extract from Milton's book, click here.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
